results.title: Torticollis as Presentation for Atypical Kawasaki Disease Complicated by Giant Coronary Artery Aneurysms
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Heparin_Low_Molecular_Weight @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006495 @@@Low-molecular-weight heparin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ were added due to the presence of @<m>DISEASE_Intracranial_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002532 @@@giant aneurysms@@@.
